languages.text: Насильственное отключение от устройства гемункула, связанного с разумом Идиры, не могло не иметь последствий. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами
Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences. Cannot be removed by regular means
languages.original_text: Насильственное отключение от устройства гемункула, связанного с разумом Идиры, не могло не иметь последствий. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами

languages.text: イディラは、自分の心とつながっているハモンキュラスの装置から強制的に引き離された。 通常の方法では除去できない
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: イディラは、自分の心とつながっているハモンキュラスの装置から強制的に引き離された。 通常の方法では除去できない

languages.text: 血伶人的装置原本与伊迪拉紧密相连，如今已经被强行摘了下来，这肯定会导致不良后果。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 血伶人的装置原本与伊迪拉紧密相连，如今已经被强行摘了下来，这肯定会导致不良后果。

languages.text: La separación forzosa de Idira del dispositivo del Hemónculo que estaba conectado a su mente tiene consecuencias, como cabía esperar. No se puede curar por medios normales
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: La separación forzosa de Idira del dispositivo del Hemónculo que estaba conectado a su mente tiene consecuencias, como cabía esperar.

languages.text: Es war zu erwarten, dass es Folgen haben würde, wenn Idira zwangweise von dem Gerät des Haemonculus getrennt wird, das mit ihrem Verstand verbunden war. Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Es war zu erwarten, dass es Folgen haben würde, wenn Idira zwangweise von dem Gerät des Haemonculus getrennt wird, das mit ihrem Verstand verbunden war.

languages.text: Forcer la déconnexion entre Idira et l'appareil de l'hémoncule allait forcément avoir des conséquences. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Forcer la déconnexion entre Idira et l'appareil de l'hémoncule allait forcément avoir des conséquences.

languages.text: İdira'nın, zihnine bağlı olan Haimonkulus'un cihazından zorla ayrılmasının tabii ki sonuçları olacaktı. Normal yollarla kaldırılamaz.
languages.original_text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: İdira'nın, zihnine bağlı olan Haimonkulus'un cihazından zorla ayrılmasının tabii ki sonuçları olacaktı. Normal yollarla kaldırılamaz.

languages.text: Idira's forced separation from the Haemonculus's device that was connected to her mind was bound to have consequences. Can't be removed by normal means.
